sentences.en: A gas released in free space would expand indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 在自由空间放出的气体将无限膨胀.

sentences.en: A gas tends to expand indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 气体具有无限膨胀的趋势.

sentences.en: A good quality plasticizer will remain in the plastic indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 性质优良的增塑剂能无限期地留在塑料内.

sentences.en: A perennial is a plant that lives indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 多年生植物是指能存活很多年的植物。

sentences.en: Assuming the systems keep operating, like I've said, we can command the vehicle from the ground and operate it fine, and remain on orbit indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 假定系统继续运行，我和所说的那样，我们可以很好地从地面指挥和操作飞船，使它无限期地留在轨道上。

sentences.en: Dick wrote that he was coming back to Paris to stay indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 迪克来信,说他要回巴黎长期呆下去.

sentences.en: Droplets or ice crystals are small enough to remain suspended aloft indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 水珠或冰晶非常小,以至于能够一直悬浮在高空中.
我不能无限期地呆在那里。

sentences.en: It can give you the ability to store indefinitely your session data where it can be retrieved not only after a restart, but from any of a number of machines in a cluster.
sentences.cn: 它可以给予您无限地存储会话数据的能力，使您的会话数据不仅可以在重新启动后检索，还可以从群集中许多机器中的任意一个检索。

sentences.en: Please write soon because we can't wait indefinitely for your answer.
sentences.cn: 请快点来信因为我们不能无限期地等你的答复.

sentences.en: The fluorine does not accumulate indefinitely in the water.
sentences.cn: 氟不会在水里无限制地积累.

sentences.en: The project has been postponed indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 这项工程被无限期延期。

sentences.en: The visit has now been postponed indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 参观现在已经被无限期推迟了。

sentences.en: These cultures can be maintained indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 这些培养物能无限期地保存.

sentences.en: They clearly could not be kept on board these tiny ships indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 他们显然不能无限期地被关闭在狭窄拥挤的舰艇上.

sentences.en: We regret to inform you that you are being furloughed indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 我们遗憾地通知您，您将要无限期地在家待岗。

sentences.en: You can borrow the book indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 你可以无限期借用这本书.

words.tran_cn: 难下定义的；难确定的；模糊不清的
不确定的；无限的；模糊的
难下定义的事物；难以确切描述的事物
不确定地，无限期地；模糊地，不明确地

trans.tran_cn: 无限期地，不定期地，不明确地，遥遥无期地
trans.tran_en: for a period of time for which no definite end has been arranged
